Meals Provided during School Closure
Greenwood
Saturday, March 14, 2020
div.p: Update: Meals will begin being served Tuesday, March 17, 2020.Â

The School District of Greenwood will be offering FREE meals to all students ages 18 and under during the mandated school closing. Meals will be provided at the Greenwood Elementary School and the Willard Community Center.Â
Please see the attached letter for full information:Â https://5il.co/dq8wÂ

Pick up locations are as follows:
Greenwood Elementary School from 7:00am - noon
Willard Community Center from 7:00 â€“ 10:00am.

You are able to pick up meals for students in other families so long as they are District residents. If you absolutely cannot make a pick up location, contact one of the school offices and we will arrange a delivery.

GREENWOOD ELEMENTARY SCHOOL OFFICE â€“ 715-267-7211
GREENWOOD MIDDLE/HIGH SCHOOL OFFICE â€“ 715-267-6101
